src_text: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.

src_text: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.

hyp_text: Katoan nan bahaso dari Latin civilis, nan bararti sipil, kaitan jo Latin civis, nan bararti warga, dan civitas, nan bararti kota atau negara bagian kota, jo nan bararti ukuran dari masyarakaik.

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.

src_text: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
ref_text: Scaffolding bukanlah caro pambalajaran namun labiah ka bantuan nan manyadioan dukuangan untuak satiok urang nan mangalami pangalaman baraja baru contohnyo mamakai program komputer baru atau mamulai proyek baru.
hyp_text: Scaffolding adolah metode nan indak dapek dipakai untuak mangajar, tapi hanyo manjadi bantuan nan manghadiahkan bantuan ka urang-urang nan maalami pambelajaran baru sacaro individu, misalnyo manggunoan program komputer anyo atau mulai proyek baru.

src_text: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
ref_text: Scaffold maya tajelmakan dalam software dan dimakasuikan untuak batanyo, mandorong, dan manjalehan tahapan nan mungkin jadi tantangan dek murik-murik untuak ditangani surang.
hyp_text: Virtual Scaffolds adolah kagiatan internal nan disimpan di dalam software dan tuannyo untuak manyangka, manyadiakan tuntutan, dan manyampaikan prosedur nan mungkin tak bisa dihadapi saorang murang.

src_text: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

hyp_text: Sajak urang ka lua nagari pado awalnyo, urang tadi mungkin sabab sabar jo manangah, sadar urang nan barantau di nagari baru harusnyo manjadi sabar.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Minangkabau (Latin script)]: Salamo labiah dari saabaik, urang-urang sacaro bahati-hati mambangun teras di dataran nan kasa, lanskap curam di tabiang nan maadok ka lauik.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Minangkabau (Latin script)]: Bagian Belgia hari-ko marupoan bagian dari Luksemburg di maso lalu namun manjadi Belgia sasudah Revolusi Belgia pado 1830.
